About me

Let me introduce myself

Hi, I'm Maxim Snoeys, student Application Development in Geel. My interest is basically only web-development.

With my knowledge of electronics from highschool I like to make some stuff for my DIY racing simulator and drone. Also, I like to cook delicious things!

Ohh by the way, this portfolio is a work in progress, there might be some rough edges here and there :)
